page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: Much entertainment centres on{village {halls}or pubs.Bedingham has neither so its inhabitants venture across the parish boundary to Woodton for village hall activities,to Woodton's King's Head or Hedenham's Mermaid;both these are lively pubs,providing food,music - discos at the former - pool,darts,etc. Woodton village hall houses a weekly Bingo club & Whist Drive,a fortnightly Over-60s Club & monthly W.I.meeting. Hedenham has a small but active W.I. which meets at its V.H.; Bedingham women belong to Woodton & District WI. Recreation lies in{gardening}-the gar- dens in Hedenham are 'opened' to raise money for the church,& provide entries for its Horticultural Show{Viticulture -Bedingham has a flourishing vineyard- {fishing}-boys get great pleasure from the pond in Bed'hm's Parish Piece-& {horseriding}on quiet road & bridleway.
